main event: A UFO was sighted in the Pacific on April 2, 1966, by military observers.
interesting points: The object was initially observed as a ball and then broke into two jagged pieces,The brilliant white center of the object had red and blue trailing edges,The sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds,The object appeared to fall and burn for several seconds before disappearing,No unusual meteorite activity was reported in the area at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: One to two pieces initially seen as a ball of fire
witness description: Military personnel including a pilot, co-pilot, and observers
